entry.tran: 恐怖的;吓人的;令人害怕的
entry.def: If you describe something as chilling, you mean it is frightening.

example.ex: He described in chilling detail how he attacked her during one of their frequent rows.
example.tran: 他绘声绘色地描述他们又一次吵架的时候，他是如何痛揍她的，让人听得胆战心惊。
